rows.label: qst701708_msg0002
rows.name:
Of course I know them. They're Shiya's
mercenary group. A gathering of perverts
who enjoy conflict, you could say.

rows.label: qst701708_msg0003
rows.name:
They handle the dirty work, like covert
operations and assassinations in enemy
territory where Shiya's own people can't go.

rows.label: qst701708_msg0004
rows.name:
But your information is old. The "Silent
Specter" was their leader two years ago.
He's left the organization now.

rows.label: qst701708_msg0005
rows.name:
Apparently, a woman he was close to was killed,
and there was a lot of trouble when he left.
Everyone involved was killed, and he vanished...

rows.label: qst701708_msg0006
rows.name:
Or so I'd like to say, but he's
a handyman now. A guy named Dio.
You didn't notice, did you?

rows.label: qst701708_msg0007
rows.name:
...Well, you did help me out. I
should at least be this useful.

rows.label: qst701708_msg0008
rows.name:
But don't get too friendly. Not
everyone is a good person like me.
